name: NSCollectionViewCompositionalLayoutConfiguration
desc: An object that defines scroll direction, section spacing, and headers or footers for the layout.

items.name: var scrollDirection: NSCollectionView.ScrollDirection
items.desc: The axis that the content in the collection view layout scrolls along.

items.name: var interSectionSpacing: CGFloat
items.desc: The amount of space between the sections in the layout.

items.name: var boundarySupplementaryItems: [NSCollectionLayoutBoundarySupplementaryItem]
items.desc: An array of the supplementary items that are associated with the boundary edges of the entire layout, such as global headers and footers.
